Variable Description: The global distribution of sheep in 2010 expressed in total number of sheep per pixel (5 min of arc) according to the Gridded Livestock of the World database (GLW 3).
Source: Gridded Livestock of the World – Latest – 2010 (GLW 3)
Citation: Gilbert, Marius; Nicolas, Gaëlle; Cinardi, Giusepina; Van Boeckel, Thomas P.; Vanwambeke, Sophie; Wint, William G. R.; Robinson, Timothy P., 2018, "Global sheep distribution in 2010 (5 minutes of arc)", https://doi.org/10.7910/DVN/BLWPZN, Harvard Dataverse, V3
